content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Mr. Abbasi, it's my pleasure to show you the apartment. I'm sure you'll find it quite appealing, especially given its prime location in the city center. Now, let's discuss the rental price. What would you consider a fair price for this beautiful space?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I believe a fair price for this apartment would be around 1,200 Euro per month, considering the quality of the construction, the size, and the central location. Would you be willing to offer it at this price?
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I'm sorry, but 1,200 Euro per month is not acceptable to me. This apartment is brand new and in a highly sought-after area. I'm looking for a price that reflects its value. Let's continue negotiating. How about 1,500 Euro per month?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your position, but 1,500 Euro per month is still quite high for an unfurnished apartment. Could we meet somewhere in the middle? Perhaps at 1,350 Euro per month? This would be more in line with the rental prices I've seen in the area.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: No, 1,350 Euro per month is not acceptable. The location and the quality of the construction justify a higher price. I'm willing to go down to 1,450 Euro per month, but that's my final offer. If you're not interested, I'll find a tenant who appreciates the value of this apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate your time and effort, but I'm sorry, 1,450 Euro per month is still beyond my budget. I'm looking for something more in the range of 1,250 Euro per month. If you can't meet this price, I'll have to consider other options.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I'm sorry to hear that, Mr. Abbasi, but 1,250 Euro per month is too low for this apartment. I'll have to find a tenant who values the prime location and the quality of this property. If you're not interested at 1,450 Euro per month, I'll terminate the negotiation.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate your efforts, but I must respectfully decline at 1,450 Euro per month. I'm looking for a more affordable option within my budget. If you have any other apartments that might fit my needs, I would be interested in seeing those as well.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I understand your budget constraints, Mr. Abbasi, but I currently only have this one apartment available. If you're not interested at 1,450 Euro per month, I'll terminate the negotiation.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I'm sorry, but 1,450 Euro per month is still not within my budget. I'll have to look for other options that better fit my financial situation. Thank you for your time and effort.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Thank you for your time as well, Mr. Abbasi. If you change your mind or are open to considering other options, please let me know. Good luck with your search. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
